ingredients: (Optional) protein (chicken, shrimp, tofu, etc.), see notes below
> or fresh Onion, carrots, mushrooms, etc. cut in small diced
(Optional) Hoisin Sauce (if using, replaces everything except soy sauce)
steps: For chicken, chop into small cubes and place into a bowl. Mix together salt, sugar, soy sauce, and oil and marinate for 15 minutes.
> Marinade: 2g salt, 4g sugar, 10g soy sauce, 5g oil
title: Fried Rice
